metadata.Title: CVE-2021-31294 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Redis before 6cbea7d allows a replica to cause an assertion failure in a primary server by sending a non-administrative command (specifically, a SET command). NOTE: this was fixed for Redis 6.2.x and 7.x in 2021. Versions before 6.2 were not intended to have safety guarantees related to this.

criterions.comment: redis package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
